title: Tropical Vibrant Patient Portal
description: A premium, visually stunning patient portal with a tropical vibrant color scheme, modern design, and advanced interactive features.

security: Implement HIPAA-compliant data storage and transmission
Use AES-256 encryption for sensitive patient data
Implement secure authentication with JWT tokens
Add session timeout and automatic logout for security
Use secure file upload with virus scanning
Implement detailed audit logging for compliance
data_handling: Validate all medical data against healthcare standards
Implement data retention and archival policies
Use FHIR-compliant data structures where applicable
Ensure patient consent tracking for data access
ui_ux: Use vibrant tropical colors while maintaining readability
Add 3D card hover effects for visual appeal
Ensure high contrast for medical data visibility
Provide contextual tooltips for medical terms
Use parallax effects sparingly to avoid motion sickness
performance: Implement lazy loading for patient images and documents
Use virtual scrolling for long patient lists
Optimize chart rendering with recharts memoization
Use code splitting for route-based optimization
